plot: Within a space infinite time, an essence in solitude feels a deep desire of company which leads to create a counter part a complementary essence, a company to be with.
title: Un universo
plot_es: Within a space infinite time, an essence in solitude feels a deep desire of company which leads to create a counter part a complementary essence, a company to be with.
plot_en: Within a space infinite time, an essence in solitude feels a deep desire of company which leads to create a counter part a complementary essence, a company to be with.
